I.title: Registry as Single Source of Truth
I.rule: All repo state lives in registry.json. If reality and registry disagree, update the registry or fix reality.

II.title: Unidirectional Dependencies
II.rule: Flow is I→II→III only. No back-edges. ORGAN-IV orchestrates, ORGAN-V documents, ORGAN-VII amplifies.

III.title: All Eight Organs Visible at Launch
III.rule: Each organ has at least one representative at launch. The eight-organ system must be visible in its entirety.

IV.title: Documentation Precedes Deployment
IV.rule: No Phase N+1 until Phase N is complete. Documentation is the deliverable.

V.title: Portfolio-Quality Documentation
V.rule: Every README is a portfolio piece. The Stranger Test applies: a grant reviewer seeing this for the first time should be convinced.

VI.title: Promotion State Machine
VI.rule: Repos follow: LOCAL → CANDIDATE → PUBLIC_PROCESS → GRADUATED → ARCHIVED. No state may be skipped.

A.title: Bronze Tier Launch Path
A.rule: 5 Perfect Repos > 44 Mediocre Repos. Completion is criteria-driven, not time-boxed.

B.title: Coordination Overhead Budget
B.rule: Budget 10% of phase TE as explicit line item for reconciling parallel AI streams.

C.title: Registry Schema Completeness
C.rule: registry.json must include dependencies[], promotion_status, tier, and last_validated fields before Phase 2.

D.title: AI Non-Determinism Acknowledgment
D.rule: All AI-generated deliverables require human review. Budget estimates use scenario banding.

quality_gates.registry: Does this deliverable update registry.json? Is the schema satisfied?
quality_gates.portfolio: Does this pass the Stranger Test? Score >=90/100 for flagships.
quality_gates.dependency: Does this respect I→II→III flow? No back-edges?
quality_gates.completeness: 0 TBD markers? 0 broken links? No placeholder content?

conditions: Source repo has comprehensive README (>=2000 words)
